## Signature Sheet

### Course: Chromatography & Measurement Systems (Eugene)

### Date: `r (Sys.Date() + 0) |> format("%A %B %d %Y")`

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| echo: false


library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(readxl)

z <- read_excel("classlist-cms.xlsx", sheet = "Sheet1") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  unite(col = "Name", c(last_name, first_name), sep = ", ") |> 
  select(Name) |> 
  mutate(Signature = "") |> 
  add_row() |> 
  mutate_all(~replace(., is.na(.), "")) |> 
  add_row() |> 
  mutate_all(~replace(., is.na(.), "")) |> 
  add_row() |> 
  mutate_all(~replace(., is.na(.), "")) |> 
  add_row() |> 
  mutate_all(~replace(., is.na(.), ""))


```

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| echo: false

gt(z) |> 
cols_width(
Name ~ px(200),
Signature ~ px(1000)
) |> 
tab_options(table.width = px(600)) |> 
cols_align(align = "left") |> 
cols_label(
Name = md("**Name**"),
Signature = md("**Signature**")
)

```
